name: Clicker Heroes
summary:
Clicker Heroes is an idle game made by Playsaurus, the developers who made Cloudstone, a popular MMORPG. Some features include an Export/Import feature, mute, option for lower quality manual+auto saving, offline farming, hard reset, 95 achievements, statistics, a skill bar, 35 heroes, and the ability to donate for perks. Playable on the home website, Kongregate, Newgrounds, ArmorGames, Unofficial Clicker-Heroes website and other sites! Their Twitter can be found here.

Kill monsters, collect gold, upgrade heroes, use skills, find treasure, kill bosses, and explore new worlds in this epic adventure!
